scripts.build: npm run compile && npm run pull
scripts.pull: bash -c 'mkdir -p public/wfbr/static/js && cp -v -r ../Braid/WaterfallBrowser/build/* public/wfbr && cp -v ../Braid/Boxer/dist/boxer.pack.js public/assets/js'
scripts.compile: bash -c 'webpack-cli --config webpack-config.js && cp -v dist/main.pack.js public/assets/js && cp -v dist/main.pack.js.map public/assets/js'
